remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.quickWrite: (function(){KISSY.one('.quick-write').on('click',function(){if(KISSY.one('input[name="name"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="name"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#gender1') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '男'){document.getElementById('gender1').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#gender2') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '女'){document.getElementById('gender2').click(); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="birthDateY"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="birthDateY"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="mobilePhone"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="mobilePhone"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="idNumber"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="idNumber"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="residence"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="residence"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_add').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="email"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="email"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact_number"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact_number"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()); } }); })()
remotejs.stockshowjs: (function(){var a = KISSY.one('#availability');if(!a)return false; var b =  a.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf('currently unavailable') != -1)return true;if(b.indexOf('in stock.') != -1 || b.indexOf('left in stock') != -1 || b.indexOf('available from') != -1)return false;return true;})()
remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()
remotejs.amazonsellJp:
(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())
remotejs.isderectMail: (function(){var h = KISSY.one('#detail-bullets .content ul>li:eq(2)') || KISSY.one('#detailBullets_feature_div ul>li:eq(3)') || KISSY.one('#prodDetails');if(!h)return false;if(h.text().indexOf('This item is also available for shipping to select countries outside the U.S.') != -1)return true;return false;})()
remotejs.getProPics: (function(){var imgs=[],selectors=['#main-image-container .image img','#main-image','#holderMainImage #main-image','#imgTagWrapperId img'];for(var i in selectors){var img=KISSY.one(selectors[i]);img!=null&&imgs.push(img.attr('src'));}return imgs;})()
remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

www_amazon_de.getpricejs: (function(){var j = KISSY.one;var a = j('#kitsune-price_feature_div') || j('#priceBlock .priceLarge') || j('#price_feature_div #priceblock_ourprice') || j('#current-price') || j('#priceblock_saleprice') || j('#actualPriceValue'); if(!a)return 0;return a.text().trim().replace('EUR','').replace('.','').replace(',', '.');})()

KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b') : h;if(i && wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return true;}if(!h1 || !wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var i = KISSY.one('#merchant-info') ? KISSY.one('#merchant-info') : h1;if(i && wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return true;}return false;})()
www_amazon_de.stockshowjs: (function(){var S=KISSY,stockIds=['#outOfStock','#availability'];var addToCart='#add-to-cart-button';if(S.one(addToCart))return false;var outMarks_Low=['derzeit nicht verfügbar'];try{for(var i in stockIds){var stockDiv=S.one(stockIds[i]);if(!stockDiv)continue;var b=stockDiv.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf(outMarks_Low[0])!=-1)return true}}catch(e){return false}return false})()

remotejs.quickWrite: (function(){KISSY.one('.quick-write').on('click',function(){if(KISSY.one('input[name="name"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="name"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#gender1') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '男'){document.getElementById('gender1').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#gender2') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '女'){document.getElementById('gender2').click(); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="birthday"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="birthday"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="phonenum"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="phonenum"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="idCard"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="idCard"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('#mailAddress')){ KISSY.one('#mailAddress').val(KISSY.one('#mt_postadd').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="email"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="email"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact_number"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="urgent_contact_number"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()); } }); })()

remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()

remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

www_amazon_de.stockshowjs: (function(){var S=KISSY,stockIds=['#outOfStock','#availability'];var addToCart='#add-to-cart-button';if(S.one(addToCart))return false;var outMarks_Low=['derzeit nicht verfügbar'];try{for(var i in stockIds){var stockDiv=S.one(stockIds[i]);if(!stockDiv)continue;var b=stockDiv.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf(outMarks_Low[0])!=-1)return true}}catch(e){return false}return false})()

}  if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_name_en_1"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="item_name_en_1"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_ywname').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_name_en"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="item_name_en"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_ywname').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('#sex1') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '男'){document.getElementById('sex1').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#sex2') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '女'){document.getElementById('sex2').click(); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_birth_date"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="item_birth_date"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_birth_date_1"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="item_birth_date_1"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_mobile_tel"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="item_mobile_tel"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="mobile"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="mobile"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_othr_2_1"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_othr_2_1"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_card_no"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="item_card_no"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_card_no_1"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="item_card_no_1"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="residence"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="residence"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_add').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('input[name="email"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="email"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_email"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="item_email"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_person"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_person"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_number"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="item_contact_number"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()); } }); })()
remotejs.stockshowjs: (function(){var a = KISSY.one('#availability');if(!a)return false; var b =  a.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf('currently unavailable') != -1)return true;if(b.indexOf('in stock.') != -1 || b.indexOf('left in stock') != -1 || b.indexOf('available from') != -1)return false;return true;})()
remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()
remotejs.amazonsellJp:
(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())
remotejs.isderectMail: (function(){var h = KISSY.one('#detail-bullets .content ul>li:eq(2)') || KISSY.one('#detailBullets_feature_div ul>li:eq(3)') || KISSY.one('#prodDetails');if(!h)return false;if(h.text().indexOf('This item is also available for shipping to select countries outside the U.S.') != -1)return true;return false;})()
remotejs.getProPics: (function(){var imgs=[],selectors=['#main-image-container .image img','#main-image','#holderMainImage #main-image','#imgTagWrapperId img'];for(var i in selectors){var img=KISSY.one(selectors[i]);img!=null&&imgs.push(img.attr('src'));}return imgs;})()
remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()

(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())

remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()

(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())

remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

remotejs.quickWrite: (function(){KISSY.one('.quick-write').on('click',function(){if(KISSY.one('input[name="UserName"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="UserName"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="englishName"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#sex1') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '男'){document.getElementById('sex1').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#sex2') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '女'){document.getElementById('sex2').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#txtBirth')){KISSY.one('#txtBirth').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#txtMobile')){ KISSY.one('#txtMobile').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#txtCode') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('#txtCode').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('#txtCity')){ KISSY.one('#txtCity').val(KISSY.one('#mt_add').html()); }   if(KISSY.one('#txtMail')){KISSY.one('#txtMail').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="info[field_height]"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="info[field_height]"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_height').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="txtAddr"]') ){KISSY.one('input[name="txtAddr"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_postadd').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('#txtEmcContact') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()){KISSY.one('#txtEmcContact').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#txtOther') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()){KISSY.one('#txtOther').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()); } }); })()
remotejs.stockshowjs: (function(){var a = KISSY.one('#availability');if(!a)return false; var b =  a.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf('currently unavailable') != -1)return true;if(b.indexOf('in stock.') != -1 || b.indexOf('left in stock') != -1 || b.indexOf('available from') != -1)return false;return true;})()
remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()
remotejs.amazonsellJp:
(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())
remotejs.isderectMail: (function(){var h = KISSY.one('#detail-bullets .content ul>li:eq(2)') || KISSY.one('#detailBullets_feature_div ul>li:eq(3)') || KISSY.one('#prodDetails');if(!h)return false;if(h.text().indexOf('This item is also available for shipping to select countries outside the U.S.') != -1)return true;return false;})()
remotejs.getProPics: (function(){var imgs=[],selectors=['#main-image-container .image img','#main-image','#holderMainImage #main-image','#imgTagWrapperId img'];for(var i in selectors){var img=KISSY.one(selectors[i]);img!=null&&imgs.push(img.attr('src'));}return imgs;})()
remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()

www_amazon_de.getpricejs: (function(){var j = KISSY.one;var a = j('#kitsune-price_feature_div') || j('#priceBlock .priceLarge') || j('#price_feature_div #priceblock_ourprice') || j('#current-price') || j('#priceblock_saleprice') || j('#actualPriceValue'); if(!a)return 0;return a.text().trim().replace('EUR','').replace('.','').replace(',', '.');})()

KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b') : h;if(i && wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return true;}if(!h1 || !wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var i = KISSY.one('#merchant-info') ? remotejs.quickWrite: (function(){KISSY.one('.quick-write').on('click',function(){if(KISSY.one('input[name="user.name"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="user.name"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_name').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="user.familyAddr"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="user.familyAddr"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_postadd').html()); }  if(KISSY.one('input[name="user.height"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="user.height"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_height').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="resume_address"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="resume_address"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_postadd').html()); } if(KISSY.one('#radiosex_0') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '男'){document.getElementById('radiosex_0').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#radiosex_1') && KISSY.one('#mt_sex').html() == '女'){document.getElementById('radiosex_1').click(); } if(KISSY.one('#birthYear') && KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()){KISSY.one('#birthYear').val(KISSY.one('#mt_birth').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="resume_mobile"]')){ KISSY.one('input[name="resume_mobile"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_tel').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="resume_certificate"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="resume_certificate"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_id').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="user.mobileNum"]')){KISSY.one('input[name="user.mobileNum"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_email').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="emergencyContactPerson"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="emergencyContactPerson"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxr').html()); } if(KISSY.one('input[name="Textsecondtel"]') && KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()){KISSY.one('input[name="Textsecondtel"]').val(KISSY.one('#mt_jjlxrtel').html()); } }); })()
remotejs.stockshowjs: (function(){var a = KISSY.one('#availability');if(!a)return false; var b =  a.text().trim().toLowerCase();if(b.indexOf('currently unavailable') != -1)return true;if(b.indexOf('in stock.') != -1 || b.indexOf('left in stock') != -1 || b.indexOf('available from') != -1)return false;return true;})()
remotejs.amazonsell: (function(a){var h=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b a'),h1=KISSY.one('#merchant-info'),searchStr='by Amazon';if(!h||!wltao_tools.isVisible(h)){var i=KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b')?KISSY.one('.availGreen ~ b'):h;if(i&&wltao_tools.isVisible(i))return 1}if(h1&&wltao_tools.isVisible(h1)){var text=h1.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('\n','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('soldbyAmazon')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('FulfilledbyAmazon')>-1)return 2}return 3})()

(function(){var textObj=KISSY.one('#centerCol');if(textObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(textObj)){var text=textObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが発送します')>-1){KISSY.Node('
').appendTo('body');return 2}}var kindelObj=KISSY.one('#kindle-av-div');if(kindelObj&&wltao_tools.isVisible(kindelObj)){var text=kindelObj.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}var special=KISSY.one('#availability_feature_div');if(special&&wltao_tools.isVisible(special)){var text=special.text().replace(new RegExp(' ','g'),'').replace(new RegExp('','g'),'');if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpが販売、発送')>-1)return 1;if(text.indexOf('Amazon.co.jpがフラストレーション・フリー・パッケージで販売、発送')>-1)return 1}return 3}())
remotejs.isderectMail: (function(){var h = KISSY.one('#detail-bullets .content ul>li:eq(2)') || KISSY.one('#detailBullets_feature_div ul>li:eq(3)') || KISSY.one('#prodDetails');if(!h)return false;if(h.text().indexOf('This item is also available for shipping to select countries outside the U.S.') != -1)return true;return false;})()
remotejs.getProPics: (function(){var imgs=[],selectors=['#main-image-container .image img','#main-image','#holderMainImage #main-image','#imgTagWrapperId img'];for(var i in selectors){var img=KISSY.one(selectors[i]);img!=null&&imgs.push(img.attr('src'));}return imgs;})()
remotejs.getPromotionalCodes: (function(){var selectors=['#quickPromoBucketContent .content ul','#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo'],searchStr=['Enter code ','Enter the promo code '],url='',code='',rs=[];for(var i=0,l=selectors.length;i<l;i++){if(KISSY.one(selectors[i])){var text=KISSY.one(selectors[i]).text();var idx=text.indexOf(searchStr[i]);var tmp;if(idx>=0){tmp=text.substr(idx+searchStr[i].length);tmp=tmp.substr(0,tmp.indexOf(' '));if(tmp!=''){code=tmp;rs.push(tmp);if($('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').text().toLowerCase().indexOf('select styles')>-1){url=KISSY.one('#heroQuickPromo_feature_div #hero-quick-promo a').attr('href');(KISSY.one('#imgTagWrapperId')||KISSY.one('.imgTagWrapper'))&&KISSY.Stat('offCode='+code+'&offCodeSite='+encodeURIComponent(url),true)}}}}}return code})()
